byline.original: By MARK LANDLER and HELENE COOPER
byline.contributor: Steven Lee Myers contributed reporting from Washington, and Neil MacFarquhar from the United Nations.

snippet: The administration’s actions illustrated its limited options toward a government with which the United States has had little contact for three decades.
lead_paragraph: The administration’s actions illustrated its limited options toward a government with which the United States has had little contact for three decades.

headline.main: U.S. Talks Tough to Iran, but Holds Off on Harsher Moves
headline.print_headline: U.S. Talks Tough to Iran, but Holds Off on Harsher Moves
headline.seo: U.S. Increases Pressure on Iran, But Holds Off on Sanctions
